Package chess

Class Knight

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.Location
      • chess.Piece
        • chess.Knight
  • public class Knight
extends Piece
    The Knight class is a subclass of the abstract Piece class, implementing movement logic for a Knight chess piece.

    Uses Set operations to check for valid moves using a hard-coded moveset (8 locations).

    Author:
    Johann von Tiesenhausen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Knight()
      Initialize moveset for the Knight.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isValid​(Location move)
      Checks if the Knight's moveset contains the relative location of a given move.
      java.util.Set<Location> validMoves​(java.util.Set<Location> locations, Location from)
      Determines the valid moves based on the intersection between possible moves for the Knight from a hypothetical location, and valid moves from the set of possible locations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Knight

        public Knight()
        Initialize moveset for the Knight. Implemented within the Knight class so that Movement logic remains flexible for each piece (ex. A moveset for rooks is not feasible).

    • Method Detail

      • validMoves

        public java.util.Set<Location> validMoves​(java.util.Set<Location> locations,
                                          Location from)
        Determines the valid moves based on the intersection between possible moves for the Knight from a hypothetical location, and valid moves from the set of possible locations.
        Specified by:
        validMoves in class Piece
        Parameters:
        locations - given set of locations to verify.
        from - location to get valid moves from. Overloads to this Piece's location
        Returns:
        the set of valid move locations from the given set.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid​(Location move)
        Checks if the Knight's moveset contains the relative location of a given move.
        Specified by:
        isValid in class Piece
        Parameters:
        move - potential move location to check
        Returns:
        whether the move is valid or not.
